Minesweeper

Project Euler's Multiples of 3 and 5 
const multipleSum = (n) => {
  // your code here
}

multipleSum(n);

Find all the squares with mines according to the rules bellow:

Return the sum of all the multiples of 3 or 5 in the left and click Run to see test if you got the right result.

If n is 10 all the numbers smaller than n and multiples of 3 or 5, are 3, 5, 6 and 9. Their sum is 23.
